location.text: This is Bayanaul Village with population of about 9000 wonderful people.
(in Kazakh) This is Bayanaul Village with population of about 9000 wonderful people.
(in Russian) This is Bayanaul Village with population of about 9000 wonderful people.

Zhasybai is the most beautiful lake of Bayanaul National Park. The place is unique in its history and nature. For example, this reservoir is considered the cleanest in Kazakhstan. • The infrastructure is not sufficiently developed, so resting in some recreation areas. The time machine will take you back to the Soviet period. Romantic, isn't it? Many holiday homes are clean and cozy, but the living conditions are often Spartan. However, do not be afraid because nature and sincere people compensate for some inconveniences. Rixos Hotel is being built on the shore of Lake Zhasybai for those who like to relax with the best service and for lovers of wild recreation, campfire food and guitar songs, there is a campsite where you can come with your tent or rent it. • From water activities, you will be offered boating, catamarans and inflatable slides. I hope you enjoy it on Zhasybai!
(in Kazakh) Zhasybai is the most beautiful lake of Bayanaul National Park.
(in Russian) Zhasybai is the most beautiful lake of Bayanaul National Park.
At Lake Toraigyr rises the Peak of the Brave. the rock bears this name recently - from the 1950s, when the mass development of tourism in the Bayanaul mountains began.
(in Kazakh) At Lake Toraigyr rises the Peak of the Brave. the rock bears this name recently - from the 1950s, when the mass development of tourism in the Bayanaul mountains began.
(in Russian) At Lake Toraigyr rises the Peak of the Brave. the rock bears this name recently - from the 1950s, when the mass development of tourism in the Bayanaul mountains began.
Another miracle of nature is the rock Kempirtas or Baba Yaga. On the one hand you will see an old woman, and on the other the appearance of a young girl.
(Kz) Another miracle of nature is the rock Kempirtas or Baba Yaga. On the one hand you will see an old woman, and on the other the appearance of a young girl.
(Ru) Another miracle of nature is the rock Kempirtas or Baba Yaga. On the one hand you will see an old woman, and on the other the appearance of a young girl.
Akbet is the highest mountain peak in Pavlodar region.
(Kz) Akbet is the highest mountain peak in Pavlodar region.
(Ru) Akbet is the highest mountain peak in Pavlodar region.
